content: I love Henry Ford’s quote, “If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got”. That got me moving and starting my first business. I also went to a seminar called “Feel the fear and do it anyway”. We all feel fear at times and it is a NORMAL emotion. It’s about getting past the fear and into action. You describe it well here in this article. Talking about your future dreams, however large, or what you dislike about your current situation, and putting it out to the universe will help you to kick start your journey. Your articles are always informative and inspiring Benjamin. Thank you for taking the time out of your PhD to write.
